item.description:
We've sloshed our way through the white wines of France, so let's head northeast to the homeland of riesling--Germany & Austria.  Winemakers in these regions produce an amazing variety of styles of wine from the riesling varietals.  And it's also home to one of the most confusing classification systems in the world.  If you know the difference between a "auslese" and a "kabinet" riesling you'll have a leg up.  If not, join us to find out!

Note the new location--Diane S residence in Northborough, MA.  Address will be sent to Yes RSVP.

group.name: The MetroWest White Wine Meetup Group

item.name: March Tasting: Old World Reislings
